data.title: Masterpieces of Fantasy and Enchantment
data.meta_description: Garden City: Doubleday Book & Music Clubs. Inc., 1988. First Edition. First edition of this collection of fantasy stories. In original, unclipped, jacket in protective sheet. Minor creasing and chipping. Grey paper with 1/4 red spine and gilded lettering on spine. Head of spine impacted with a 1/4 inch closed tear, else fine. Slightly deckled long edge. Interior is clean and clear. Pages:  16
data.text:
Garden City: Doubleday Book & Music Clubs. Inc., 1988. First Edition. First edition of this collection of fantasy stories. In original, unclipped, jacket in protective sheet. Minor creasing and chipping. Grey paper with 1/4 red spine and gilded lettering on spine. Head of spine impacted with a 1/4 inch closed tear, else fine. Slightly deckled long edge. Interior is clean and clear.

Pages: (16) 622 Dimensions: 8½ x 5¾ x 1⅜ . Very Good / Very Good. Item #4972
